title: Why Trump Hit 90-Day Pause On Tariffs For All Countries, Except China
content: Donald Trump announced a 90-day pause on tariffs for all countries, except China - for which he announced an immediate increase in tariffs to 125 per cent.

title: How Headley's Testimony Nailed Tahawwur Rana's Role Before An Indian Court
content: Tahawwur Rana's involvement in the conspiracy behind the 26/11 terror attacks in Mumbai was established during the deposition of David Coleman Headley, his childhood friend and a key accused in the terror attacks case

title: "Do Not Retaliate": White House Warns After Trump's 125% Tariffs On China
content: In a stunning turn of events, US President Donald Trump on Wednesday reversed his sweeping tariffs on most nations for at least 90 days.

title: Exclusive: Ex-Navy Chief On Rafale Jets And Chinese Threat In Indian Ocean
content: Former Chief of Naval Staff, Admiral Arun Prakash, spoke to NDTV on the induction of the Rafale fighter jets, explaining how it will add a "kinetic push in the Navy's striking power".

title: Flight Carrying Tahawwur Rana Has Left US, To Land In Delhi Today: Sources
content: Tahawwur Rana, India's most wanted who is accused of plotting the 26/11 terror attacks in Mumbai, is on way back to face the law.

title: Trump's Tariff Gamechanger Pins China At 125%, Isolates Beijing From Rest
content: Donald Trump's reciprocal tariffs, which was meant to impose levies against all those who tariff US goods, has taken a fresh turn. It has evolved into a slugfest between China and the United States.

title: "You Are Not Welcome": No US Visas, Residence Permits If You Do This
content: Since coming to power in January, Donald Trump has deported some foreign students and revoked multiple visas.

title: "I Was Making A Choice...": Michelle Obama Opens Up About Divorce Rumours
content: Michelle Obama has spoken about stepping back from political events and shutting down rumours about her marriage.

title: Who Is David Headley, How Is He Linked To 26/11 Accused Tahawwur Rana
content: David Coleman Headley is one of the key conspirators of the 2008 bombings that killed 166 people in Mumbai.

title: "Dhoni Coming Out With Sword": Rayudu's Comment Gets Epic Reply From Sidhu
content: MS Dhoni, albeit for a short duration, gave the fans a glimpse of his old self during Chennai Super Kings' IPL 2025 match against Punjab Kings

title: 10 Days Before Daughter's Wedding, UP Woman Elopes With Would-Be Son-In-Law
content: Shivani was supposed to get married in 10 days. The invitations were printed and relatives had been invited. Then came a twist that left Shivani and her entire family stunned - her mother eloped with her would-be groom.

title: 30-Year-Old Woman With 3 Children Converts, Marries Class 12 Student In UP
content: A 30-year-old woman with three children converted to Hinduism and married a 12th-grade student in a temple ceremony in Uttar Pradesh's Amroha district on Wednesday, police officials said.

title: Sai Sudharsan Shatters Record Books, Becomes First Indian Ever In IPL To...
content: Sai Sudharsan delivered a commanding performance with the bat, smashing 82 off just 53 balls as GT posted a formidable 217/6 against RR

title: On Camera, Bihar Villagers Attack Cops Who Went To Arrest Drunk Men
content: The police team had gone to a village in Siwan to arrest the drunk men. The cops, however, were attacked when they detained a man.

title: India Gets Taste Of Satellite-Based Internet During Myanmar Quake Ops
content: India tried its first real-time use of satellite-based Internet during New Delhi's Operation Brahma - providing aid to the quake-hit residents of Myanmar.

title: India Gets Taste Of Satellite-Based Internet During Myanmar Quake Ops
content: India tried its first real-time use of satellite-based Internet during New Delhi's Operation Brahma - providing aid to the quake-hit residents of Myanmar.

title: More female hatchlings among Olive Ridleys at Rushikulya due to rise in temperature, says study
content: The hatchling sex ratio from arribadas at Rushikulya was found to be about 71% female on average, study finds

title: Will the new garbage tax give a push to wet waste composting?
content: Right now, at the ward-level, barring a few bio-methanisation plants and lane composters, decentralised composting is insignificant compared to the huge amount of waste generated

title: Solidarity, SIO march against Waqf Act in Kerala’s Karipur
content: All India Muslim Personal Law Board member and Jamat-e-Islami national vice president Malik Mohtasim Khan inaugurated the march.

title: Hyderabad police move to cancel registrations of 20 vehicles driven by minors
content: Over 300 cases have been booked with three days of the drive, with traffic officials recording an average of 100–120 violations per day.

title: 16-member panel formed to study the effect of U.S. tariff on aqua products
content: The 16-member panel will submit preliminary report in five days on the impact of US reciprocal tariff; it will also submit a report on the long and short term measures to be taken to overcome the situation

title: Tourism Minister hardsells A.P. as right destination for investments
content: Tourism Minister Kandula Durgesh met representatives of the hotel groups like Marriot, IHG Group, Hilton, Lemon Tree, Blackstone, Ambuja and Suba Hotels

title: Delimitation debate: A conflict between the principle of democracy and one of federalism
content: The delimitation debate has to take into account the relative weights of individual electors and individual States

title: How the police view custodial torture in India: Data
content: The data reveals an acceptance of coercive tactics ranging from verbal abuse and threats to slapping and third-degree methods even for minor offences

title: Maharashtra to launch healthcare mission with ADB support: Fadnavis
content: The Medical Education and Public Health departments are to jointly submit a detailed project report focused on strengthening health infrastructure and delivering quality care

title: Naruvi and The Hindu to host webinar ‘Healthy Spine, Healthy Life’ on April 13
content: This session is part of the ongoing Healthy India, Happy India series — a 15-part webinar initiative aimed at promoting awareness, disease prevention, and overall wellness across India.

title: Kerala Government hopes to get Governor’s nod for six Bills
content: The Bills that will be submitted for the Governor’s clearance include the Kerala State Private Universities (Establishment and Regulation) Bill, 2025, the University Laws (amendment) Bill, 2025, the Kerala State Elderly Commission Bill, 2025, the University Laws (Amendment) (No.2) Bill, 2025, the Kerala Sports (amendment) Bill, 2024 and the Kerala Industrial Infrastructure Development (Amendment) Bill, 2024

title: ASI investigates fire at Devgiri fort in Maharashtra; wildlife, heritage site affected
content: The ASI has confirmed it will formulate a disaster menagement plan aimed at preventing similar incidents in the future based on the the assessment of the current damage.

title: Life limps back to normal in Muzaffarnagar after Waqf Bill protest, notices to 300 for wearing black bands
content: The Lok Sabha passed the Bill on Thursday, and Parliament on Friday (April 4 ) cleared it after a nearly 14-hour debate in the Rajya Sabha.

title: IIT-Madras’ Centre for AI Research to work on efficient, task-specific models for CPUs
content: IIT Madras Pravartak Foundation partners with Ziroh Labs for research in practical, efficient AI solutions

title: Tamil Nadu Mediation and Conciliation Centre celebrates its 20th foundation day
content: Justices S.S. Sundar, Anita Sumanth, G.K. Ilanthiraiyan and D. Bharatha Chakravarthy distribute pamphlets inside Madras High Court campus

title: Syro-Malabar Church slams allegations over landed property
content: The attempt is to make the Catholic Church go on the defensive and to unleash strong criticism of the Church and its activities, says official spokesman of the Syro-Malabar Church

title: LDF, UDF lock horns over ASHA workers at Kochi Corporation Council meeting
content: UDF councillor V.K. Minimol moves resolution demanding increase in remuneration of ASHAs in the Kochi Corporation; LDF members dub it as a politically motivated act

title: All commercial buildings, hospitals to be brought under the purview of Fire Services Act
content: As per the existing rules, only high-rise commercial buildings over and above 15 metres in height, and residential buildings above 18 metres in height are required to take a no-objection certificate from the Fire Services Department in order to get the building permissions

title: Supreme Court to hear Waqf law challenge on April 16
content: Centre has already filed a caveat in Supreme Court to ensure no order is passed without hearing it first; case listed before a Bench headed by Chief Justice of India Sanjiv Khanna

title: Mamata assures minorities that she will protect their interests
content: West Bengal Chief Minister’s remarks come a day after protests over the Waqf (Amendment) Act turned violent at Jangipur in Murshidabad district where a mob set police vehicles on fire.

title: Values enshrined by Jainism offer answer to global challenges: PM Modi
content: The Prime Minister claimed during his virtual address on Navkar Mahamantra Divas, that Jain principles of self-purification, non-violence, and collective well-being align with his vision of ‘Viksit Bharat’.

title: Tahawwur Rana a small player, U.S. had stalled Headley’s extradition, says ex-Home Secretary G.K. Pillai
content: Despite knowing about the terror plan, the U.S. let Rana’s school friend and main conspirator, David Coleman Headley, to continue with his ‘anti-India activity’; and after the latter’s arrest in 2009, the Americans stalled his extradition to India by offering him plea-bargaining, he says

title: New Cyber Command headed by Director General of Police to tackle cybercrimes and cybersecurity
content: The move comes amidst rising cybercrime cases in the State. Bengaluru accounts for 20% of all cybercrimes registered in megacities in the country

title: West Bengal will file review petition in Supreme Court on annulment of employment, says Chief Secretary
content: West Bengal Chief Secretary Manoj Pant said that the State government has already filed a clarificatory petition urging the Supreme Court to allow teachers to work

title: It’s curtains down on BJP’s Christian ‘romance drama’: Pinarayi
content: He says RSS will inevitably target Catholic Church’s properties; the BJP may test the waters by introducing a private members’ Bill in Lok Sabha

title: BJP attacks Rahul Gandhi’s ‘belated’ response to Waqf Act
content: ‘Do you have a problem if Waqf is being reformed for the betterment of the women, widows, of the Muslim community?’ BJP MP Ravi Shankar Prasad said at a press conference

title: Karnataka explores legal framework to regulate online gaming
content: Karnataka is considering adopting a model similar to that of Chhattisgarh, which allows skill-based gaming while prohibiting betting and games of luck

title: Two encounters rage in J&K’s Udhampur, Kishtwar: Officials
content: According to the officials in Jammu and Kashmir, five to six militants are suspected to be in hiding, with no casualties on either side reported so far.

title: Senthilbalaji’s brother Ashok Kumar appears before Principal Sessions Court
content: Ashok Kumar and 12 others appeared before the court after it issued summonses. The court directed them to file sureties of ₹2 lakh each before April 20 and adjourned the case for further hearing to April 25

title: Victim’s mother moves Supreme Court against Allahabad High Court order on rape attempt
content: The top court had remarked the order of the High Court was ‘totally insensitive, inhuman” and “unknown to the tenets of law’

title: Tirupati-Katpadi railway line to be doubled at ₹1,332 crore
content: Cabinet approves project; It will improve connectivity to Tirumala temple and other places of worship and tourist destinations, says Railways

title: NC, PDP to move Supreme Court over Waqf Act; Mirwaiz to support AIMPLB’s legal action
content: A scheduled meeting of the Mutahida Majlis Ulema (MMU), an amalgam of over 20 religious organisations in J&K, was disallowed by the authorities

title: ASHAs stir: panel to submit report in three months
content: Incentive announced by the Union government at the time of the launch of ASHA scheme remained the same even now, says Chief Minister

title: Differently-abled association seeks unconditional apology from Minister Duraimurgan
content: Minister Duraimurugan had allegedly used derogatory terms denoting deformities of differently abled people for comparison with opposition political parties.

title: Andhra Pradesh govt. planning to establish Mega Global Medicity in Amaravati
content: It is one among the 25 projects proposed under PPP model by the Centre across the country; Andhra Pradesh has already expressed its willingness to allot 200 acres for it in CRDA limits

title: Kerala Tourism ties up with Malaysia Airlines to boost inbound travel
content: The move is part of exploration of the vast East Asian markets as part of Kerala Tourism’s ‘Look East’ campaign

title: Cross-border liquor smuggling completely stopped: Kollu Ravindra
content: The availability of more than 300 multinational brands of liquor at affordable prices has obviously avoided the need for smuggling, says Minister for Excise and Prohibition

title: India’s MMR comparison to Nigeria unfair, says Health Ministry
content: Report by United Nations Maternal Mortality Estimation Inter-Agency Group (MMEIG) states that India has made significant strides in reducing MMR but it registered 19,000 maternal deaths in 2023 — contributing almost 7.2% to global mortality

title: Virudhunagar ‘Samba Vathal’ gets GI Tag
content: A distinguished variety of chilli, it is known for unique flavour, moderate heat and vibrant red colour

title: Operation Nanhe Farishte: Over 580 children rescued by RPF in South Western Railway zone
content: According to the data accessed by The Hindu, of the total rescued, 480 were boys and 103 were girls, who were either reunited with their families or placed in institutional care.

title: Water Board to launch ‘motor-free tapwater’ campaign
content: To conserve water and ensure fair supply and use by all consumers, the Board said violations can be reported at customer care number 155313

title: ‘NTR Sujala Sravanthi’ will be relaunched in Nellore district at a cost of ₹4.8 crore, says Municipal Administration Minister Narayana
content: Under the scheme, the government proposes to provide 20 litres of safe drinking water to each household for ₹2

title: Centre gives nod to six more Eklavya Model Residential Schools in Tripura
content: The schools will be managed by the Tripura Tribal Welfare Residential Educational Institutions Society

title: Chittoor MP thanks Centre for allocating ₹1,332 crore for Tirupati-Katpadi railway line
content: The ambitious project involves the construction of a 104-km double line, which will galvanise Chittoor’s rail connectivity and transport network in the region, says Chittoor MP

title: ED convinced that CPI(M) has no account in Karuvannur bank, says MP
content: ED had claimed that the Thrissur district committee of the party had opened an account in the bank in 2017 while K. Radhakrishnan was the CPI(M) district secretary

title: Adelman: Nuggets still can do 'something special'
content: Interim coach David Adelman said he remained confident the Nuggets "have a great chance to do something special," even after Tuesday's shocking dismissals of Michael Malone and Calvin Booth.

title: Police called after Dolphins' Hill, wife in dispute
content: Police were called to the South Florida residence of Dolphins receiver Tyreek Hill following a domestic dispute, though no charges were filed.

title: Pedro Martinez: Family missing after roof collapse
content: Hall of Fame pitcher Pedro Martinez said on social media that several of his family members were inside the nightclub that collapsed in the Dominican Republic.

title: Bulls' Ball hosts family of donor for his transplant
content: Bulls guard Lonzo Ball had an emotional meeting with the family of the late Alex Reinhardt, who donated the knee cartilage Ball received in a transplant two years ago.

title: Messi PK seals comeback to oust LAFC from cup
content: Lionel Messi and Inter Miami CF are headed to the Concacaf Champions Cup semifinals and it took a dramatic three-goal comeback to get there.

title: Power 4 heads unite on Hill, lobby for NIL guidance
content: Big Ten, SEC, Big 12 and ACC leaders gathered on Capitol Hill on Wednesday to meet with lawmakers and lobby for federal NIL guidelines -- a strong show of unity from the Power 4 just days after college athletics inched closer to a landmark settlement.

title: Jets' Fields: 2024 benching changed 'perspective'
content: Justin Fields said being benched by the Steelers was a different experience for him, but his confidence never wavered and he's excited to prove himself with the Jets.

title: Bellinger swears off wings after food poisoning
content: Yankees outfielder Cody Bellinger has sworn off chicken wings for five years following his recent bout with food poisoning.

title: McIlroy vs. Scheffler: Contrasting styles, but both the clear favorites in Augusta
content: The Masters isn't match play between two golfers. But given their recent performances, Scottie Scheffler and Rory McIlroy both figure to be in the mix when Sunday comes around.

title: How Paige Bueckers’ game will translate to the WNBA
content: Only Caitlin Clark and Sue Bird have averaged 10 PPG and 5 APG as WNBA rookies, a group Bueckers should aspire to join.

title: Barça quietly building one of the greatest UCL campaigns ever
content: Lewandowski notched his 40th goal, Raphinha has Messi-like stats, and Yamal is the best player in the world. Dortmund were blown away Wednesday by a team that is beginning to look era-defining.

title: The USWNT doesn't have a No. 1 goalkeeper and it's unclear who will start at World Cup
content: After years of Alyssa Naeher and Hope Solo dominating, the USWNT is without a No. 1 goalkeeper ahead of the 2027 Women's World Cup.

title: Raphinha apologizes to Cubarsi for stolen goal
content: Raphinha apologized to Pau Cubarsí for stealing his goal after opening the scoring in Barcelona's 4-0 Champions League quarterfinal rout against Borussia Dortmund at the Olympic Stadium on Wednesday.

title: PSG star's goal lives up to 'Kvaradona' nickname
content: A wonder goal from Khvicha Kvaratskhelia upstaged a brilliant curling shot from teammate Désiré Doué as Paris Saint-Germain beat Aston Villa 3-1 in the first leg of the Champions League quarterfinals on Wednesday.

title: Emre Can rips 'soft' Dortmund after Barça mauling
content: Borussia Dortmund captain Emre Can launched an angry tirade against his teammates after his side were thrashed 4-0 by Barcelona in their Champions League quarterfinal first leg on Wednesday.

title: Source: Salah edging closer to new Liverpool deal
content: Liverpool forward Mohamed Salah is edging closer to signing a new deal at Anfield, a source confirmed.

title: Emery: PSG's third goal 'doesn't change a lot'
content: Unai Emery said Aston Villa can overturn a 3-1 first-leg deficit against Paris Saint-Germain by being "strong" at home.

title: Matić jabs at Onana: Among Utd's worst-ever GKs
content: Ex-Manchester United midfielder Nemanja Matić has hit back at goalkeeper André Onana, saying he is "one of the worst goalkeepers" in the club's history.

title: Olympics: More women's teams than men's in L.A.
content: Female athletes will be in the majority at an Olympics for the first time at the 2028 Los Angeles Summer Games thanks to a big win for women's soccer, which will now feature 16 teams.

title: From Lobo's 1995 champs to Bueckers' 2025 crown: Ranking all 12 UConn title teams
content: Paige Bueckers helped UConn win its 12th NCAA championship, and first since 2016. Where does this title rank?

title: Cam Ward, Shedeur Sanders and the shared weakness that could make or break their NFL careers
content: Hanging on to the ball too long is a tough habit to break. Can the NFL draft's top QBs get their throws out quicker in the pros?

title: 'A big swing-and-miss': Has Deshaun Watson played his last down in the NFL?
content: Browns owner Jimmy Haslam admitted for the first time last week that the 2022 trade for Watson was a failure. What's next for Cleveland and its QB?

title: 'Violence. Lots of violence': What to expect in Patricio Pitbull's UFC debut
content: One of the best fighters to never have competed in the UFC -- until now -- looks to prove himself at UFC 314.

title: Our hottest early MLB hot takes: From a Cy Young trifecta to an MVP candidate you've never heard of
content: What can we glean from two weeks of baseball? Enough to make our experts go all-in on their boldest predictions.

title: How has the torpedo bat changed the industry?
content: The torpedo bat's rise has changed the industry for the companies that make them. Here is one bat-maker's story.

title: High school teammates Max Fried and Jack Flaherty make first MLB starts against each other
content: In 2012, future major leaguers Jack Flaherty and Max Fried (as well as Lucas Giolito) all shared the same high school dugout for Harvard-Westlake.

title: Scottie Scheffler's success on the course starts with his work off it
content: Scheffler's success on the course is built on otherworldly skill -- but it's also built on an emphasis on fitness that's helped unlock his best golf.

title: 'I just have a good feel about the place': A decade later, can Jordan Spieth do it again?
content: Ten years ago, Spieth had his lone coronation at the Masters. He still believes he can get another shot.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Barça, Saudi clubs eye move for Díaz
content: Barcelona are facing competition to sign Liverpool's Luis Díaz. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: Today in IPL: RCB vs DC - All you need to know
content: The Delhi Capitals have three wins from as many matches, and the Royal Challengers Bengaluru bagged three victories from four games. That record testifies their wonderful shapeshifting ability according to opponents and conditions. Royal Challengers Bangalore have demonstrated impressive adaptability, securing victories in diverse conditions across Kolkata, Chennai, and Mumbai. Their sole defeat occurred at their home ground against Gujarat Titans, an anomaly attributed more to an uncharacteristically slow Chinnaswamy pitch than their performance.

title: US woman finds her soulmate 14,800km away in Andhra Pradesh's Nellore
content: After losing everything in a wildfire and facing personal setbacks, Jaclyn Forero, a photographer from Texas, found love with Chandan, a Christian photographer from Nellore, Andhra Pradesh—9 years her junior. What began with a 'Hi' on Instagram blossomed into a cross-continental romance, culminating in Jaclyn flying across the globe to marry him.

title: US: We will revoke or deny Visa if your social media posts are in support of ...
content: The U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services (USCIS) has announced that social media activity can now impact visa approvals or lead to visa revocations. According to a USCIS statement, the agency will review social media profiles and may deny visas or residency permits to individuals whose posts are deemed anti-Semitic under the policies of the current administration.

title: Watch: Footage shows the moment roof collapsed in Dominican Republic killing 184
content: At least 184 people have died after the roof of Jet Set nightclub in Santo Domingo collapsed during a merengue concert. Singer Rubby Pérez was among the dead. Rescue efforts have ended, with dozens still missing. Families wait desperately for answers, while investigations continue into the cause of the collapse. Authorities have yet to release inspection records.

title: Asian stocks jump after US markets hit record highs: 10 things to know
content: Asian markets surged on Thursday after Trump announced a 90-day pause on most planned tariffs, replacing them with a reduced 10% Reciprocal Tariff. The move sparked a global relief rally, with Wall Street recording historic gains and Asian indices following suit. Japan’s Nikkei 225 soared over 2,000 points, and Taiwan's tech-heavy Taiex surged 9.2%.

title: For viral video, man pretends to consume booze, eggs in Delhi metro, held
content: Aakash Kumar (25) was arrested for creating a public nuisance in a Delhi Metro train by pretending to drink alcohol and eat eggs to gain social media fame. The act, captured in a viral video on the Pink Line, led to a complaint by Karkardooma Metro's Senior Station Manager. Kumar was apprehended by Metro Police on April 8.

title: Jeff Bezos’ Mar-a-Lago dinner led to Melania Trump’s $40m Amazon Prime project
content: Melania Trump, First Lady of the United States, is currently keeping herself occupied by working on a documentary with Amazon to capture her life moments as First Lady and Donald Trump's return to the White House. Melania will serve as an executive producer on the Prime Video project, which is due to be released later this year.

title: Walmart Boycott: Largest retailer tells protesters, 'we're America's ...'
content: Walmart is facing a week-long boycott, "Walmart Blackout," led by People’s Union USA over DEI rollbacks and tax concerns. While Walmart defends its community contributions and tax payments, critics argue the DEI changes undermine workplace diversity. Data suggests Walmart is more resilient to boycotts than Target, which faced significant backlash for similar initiatives.

title: Are BSE, NSE closed on April 10 for Mahavir Jayanti?
content: Stock market holiday today: The Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) and National Stock Exchange (NSE) are closed for trading today, April 10. Regular trading sessions, operating from 9:15 a.m. to 3:30 p.m. IST, will continue on Friday, April 11.

title: Lawsuit against Taylor Swift: Travis Kelce's beau accused of IP theft
content: Florida-based poet Teresa La Dart Marasco has filed a sweeping legal complaint against Taylor Swift and her production company, alleging that Swift unlawfully used her poetry in songs and visuals on four major albums: Lover, Folklore, Midnights, and The Tortured Poets Department. Marasco accuses the global music icon of a “pattern of intellectual property theft” and is seeking $30 million in damages.

title: South Korea opposition leader Lee Jae-Myung announces presidential bid
content: South Korea’s opposition leader Lee Jae-myung announced his presidential bid to succeed President Yoon Suk Yeol's after his impeachment. Emphasising economic reform and pragmatic diplomacy, Lee leads early polls ahead of the June 3 election. He resigned party leadership to focus on campaigning, aiming to prioritise national interest and address inequality.

title: Mahavir Jayanti: Best wishes, messages, quotes and images to share
content: Mahavir Jayanti 2025 celebrates the birth of Lord Mahavir, emphasizing peace, non-violence, and truth. This article includes heartfelt wishes, messages, and inspirational quotes to share with all of your loved ones. Let’s honor Mahavir’s teachings by embracing kindness, self-discipline, and compassion in our lives. Wishing everyone a joyous and blessed Mahavir Jayanti!

title: April 2025 bank holidays: Are banks closed on April 10, 2025 for Mahavir Jayanti?
content: Banks will be closed in Gujarat, Mizoram, Maharashtra, Karnataka, Madhya Pradesh, Tamil Nadu, Rajasthan, Uttar Pradesh, West Bengal, New Delhi, Chhattisgarh, and Jharkhand on April 10, 2025.

title: 'Sikandar' slowly inches toward Rs 110 crore in India
content: Salman Khan’s Eid release 'Sikandar' generated major buzz but failed to meet expectations. Despite an impressive start, it struggled at the box office, earning ₹107.10 crore in 11 days. The action film, co-starring Rashmika Mandanna, faced steep drops in collections and stiff competition from 'L2: Empuraan'. Mixed reviews and an underwhelming performance marked a lukewarm reception for the much-hyped release.

title: Pirates’ Joey Bart recalls collusion with Endy Rodriguez mid game
content: Despite winning against the St. Louis Cardinals, the Pittsburgh Pirates proved to be a solid team on Wednesday night. Catcher Joey Bart explains how a collusion took place Endy Rodriguez right in the middle of the same

title: 'Living her best life': Gisele Bündchen glows in new life with Joaquim Valente
content: Gisele Bündchen, a 44-year-old supermodel, is enjoying the warmth of Miami's sun and her new life with boyfriend Joaquim Valente. Despite not expecting this life shift, Bündchen is fully embracing it with joy, often enjoying the outdoors, riding water bikes, and lounging on yachts with Valente. A source close to the model says she is living her best life and it shows.

title: Delhi court stays further probe against Kapil Mishra in 2020 riots case
content: A Delhi court has stayed an order directing further probe against Delhi minister Kapil Mishra in the 2020 riots case until April 21. The stay follows Mishra's challenge to the magistrate's April 1 order. Delhi Police also opposed the order, citing jurisdictional overreach. The court has sought a response from complainant Mohammad Ilyas by the next hearing.

title: Ex MLB players killed in Dominican Republic roof collapse incident
content: A tragedy led to the deaths of over 113 people in the Dominican Republic, including ex-Major League Baseball players Octavio Dotel and Tony Blanco, and Nelson Cruz's sister, Nelsy Cruz. MLB Commissioner and MLB Players Association expressed grief over the incident.

title: 'Anti-Semitic activity on net will result in denial of visa or green card'
content: The US Citizenship and Immigration Services (USCIS) in a release stated, “Today, USCIS will begin considering aliens’ antisemitic activity on social media and the physical harassment of Jewish individuals as grounds for denying immigration benefit requests. This will immediately affect aliens applying for lawful permanent resident status, foreign students and aliens affiliated with educational institutions linked to antisemitic activity.”

title: How does the F1 championship look heading into the Bahrain GP?
content: Max Verstappen has caught up to Lando Norris in the drivers' championship . the forecast is hot and sunny with daytime highs of 36°C from Friday through to Sunday . nighttime temperatures are expected to drop to around 22°C .

title: How each team could win the national championship
content: the 2025 men's Frozen Four is the culmination of the NCAA hockey tournament . it features two teams with a lot of experience on this stage and two newcomers . the semifinal matchups will be Thursday at 5 and 8:30 p.m. ET at the Enterprise Center in St. Louis .

title: King James meets Ken: LeBron enters 'Barbie World' in historic fashion
content: leBron James will soon be seen on toy shelves around the country . the four-time NBA champion is the first athlete to have his own replica of a Ken doll . "it's an opportunity to recognize the powerful impact of role models," he says .

title: PSG's comeback against Villa shows desire for Champions League glory
content: Désiré Doué and Khvicha Kvaratskhelia scored wonder goals to put PSG on course for the UEFA champions league semifinals . the home side dominated the game and should have scored more . but now aston villa face a major upset against the newly crowned Ligue 1 champions st james' park .

title: NBA Power Rankings: Where all 30 teams stack up at the end of the regular season
content: the 2024-25 season wraps up Sunday but all eyes will be on Wednesday's clash with the Dallas Mavericks . the Sacramento Kings host the Denver Nuggets (ESPN, 10:30 p.m. ET), who will take the court for the first time since Tuesday's firing of an NBA coach . top playoff contenders are aiming to lock up their postseason spots .

title: Where Cooper Flagg's season ranks among 25 greatest from freshmen this century
content: he has been the most hyped freshman in men's college basketball in years . he had to play at a level few have reached, sweeping national player of the year awards . here's where his campaign stands among the top 25 seasons by freshmen .

title: At Arthur Road, Tahawwur Rana may stay in Kasab's old cell
content: Mateen Hafeez, special correspondent at The Times of India in Mumbai, reports on terrorism, underworld, cybercrime and organized crime syndicates. He also writes about the jails in Maharashtra and focuses on human interest stories. He has covered the Ghatkopar bomb blast, Vile Parle bomb blast, Mulund train blast, train serial blasts in 2006, 26/11 terror attacks and Pune's German Bakery bomb blast. He has a special interest in Urdu fiction written by Ibn-e-Safi.
